alert.note: Alert for Meagher (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 10 at 10:21AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 AM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt is occurring. * WHERE...Portions of central and southwest Montana, including the following counties, in central Montana, Meagher. In southwest Montana, Gallatin. * WHEN...Until 1015 AM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1016 AM MDT, local law enforcement reported flooding in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... White Sulphur Springs, Newlan Creek Reservoir, Ringling, Checkerboard, Lennep, Fort Logan, Fort Logan On The Smith River and Martinsdale. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
